descriptions: Developed and implemented robust automation solutions for web applications, significantly enhancing efficiency and minimizing manual effort.
Experienced in scripting with Python, leveraging the Selenium library for web browser automation.
Skilled in database management and interaction, using Microsoft SQL Server and MySQL for data-driven testing and automation.
Worked on debugging automation scripts to identify and resolve issues as well as worked on enhancements and maintenance to ensure the continued effectiveness of the automation suite.
Leveraged Unix shell scripting to automate tasks related to web application deployment, maintenance, and other operational processes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (QA, DevOps, Product) to identify automation opportunities, translating business needs into technical solutions that reduced operational costs by 40%.
Maintained and documented the automation project for project management applications.
Reduced operational costs by 40% through scalable automation solutions; regularly debugged and maintained scripts for long-term performance.
Developed and maintained user interfaces using React.js, contributing to a seamless and engaging user experience.
Implemented state management solutions using Redux, optimizing application performance and data flow.
Experienced in working with RESTful APIs, utilizing Postman for API testing and integration, and connecting front-end applications with back-end services built with Spring Boot using Axios.
Assisted in the development of back-end services, contributing to the implementation of business logic within the Spring Boot framework.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and back-end developers, to deliver high-quality products on time.
Utilized version control systems (Git) for collaborative development, code management, and efficient bug tracking.
Demonstrated a strong understanding of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum) and participated in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Gained practical experience in full-stack web development, contributing to various stages of the software development lifecycle.
Developed front-end user interfaces using React, creating dynamic and responsive web applications.
Built and managed databases using MySQL, utilizing JDBC and Hibernate for data persistence and retrieval.

Developed back-end services and APIs with Java Spring Boot, contributing to the creation of robust and scalable applications. Connected the front-end and back-end using Axios for seamless data exchange.
Learned and applied software development principles, including object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms.
Gained a foundational understanding of microservices architecture and its benefits.
Utilized GitHub for version control, collaborative development, and code management.
